import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update supplier"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/suppliers/{supplierId}/update"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing supplier record.

**Updatable Fields**:
- `Name` - Supplier display name
- `Phone` - Primary phone number
- `SupplierNumber` - Internal vendor number
- `SupplierUrl` - Website URL
- `ContactName` / `ContactEmail` - Primary contact
- `AdditionalContactName` / `AdditionalContactEmail` - Secondary contact
- `Description` - Notes about the supplier
- `SupplierTypeId` - Supplier category
- `AddressId` - Associated address

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"supplierId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the supplier to update.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Updated supplier data.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request body for creating or updating a supplier.","properties":{"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the supplier."},"Phone":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Primary phone number."},"SupplierNumber":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Internal supplier/vendor number."},"SupplierUrl":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Supplier website URL."},"ContactName":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Primary contact person name."},"ContactEmail":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Primary contact email address."},"AdditionalContactName":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Secondary contact person name."},"AdditionalContactEmail":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Secondary contact email address."},"Description":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Description or notes about the supplier."},"SupplierTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the supplier type category."},"AddressId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the supplier's address."}},"title":"UpdateSupplierRequest"},"example":{"Name":"IncidentIQ Demo Supplier","Phone":"555-987-6543","ContactEmail":"demo@incidentiq.com"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
